title: The Benefits of Blockchain Technology for Startups
summary: A digital ledger is distributed across a network of computers that are connected to each other via a peer-to-peer network. This means that the data is not stored in one central place, but is distributed among all computers in the network. Because there is no central authority, the data must be verified by a majority of computers. This way, all parties can feel confident that the system is fair and accurate. A blockchain network can be used to securely store and manage user data. The technology can help you gain customers more quickly by providing them with the ability to transfer and share data and assets.
